description:
Eight months after tying the knot in April 2011, Paul Wesley and Torrey DeVitto put their hard-earned cash to use on a $980,000 home in the Hollywood Hills.在2011年4月Paul Wesley和Torrey DeVitto结婚后的8个月，两个人从他们的血汗钱里拿了98万美元买下了这桩位于好莱坞山的房子。

The magical, two-story house was built in 1926 and features its original Spanish Colonial architecture. The 3,200 square-foot home boasts 4 bedrooms. 这桩2层楼、奇幻风格的房子是由一位西班牙艺术家在1926年砌的。这幢房子有3200平米，4个卧室。

However, on Monday, July 29, the Vampire Diaries couple announced they were “amicably” ending their marriage. On top of numerous other questions, we can’t help but wonder who’s going to get custody of their gorgeous home. Seeing that Paul already has a house in Atlanta where he spends most of his time filming TVD.然而今年7月29日（周一），这对《吸血鬼日记》夫妻宣布他们正在友善地结束他们的婚姻关系。在离婚的各种琐碎问题中，我们忍不住好奇，这栋完美爱巢将会给谁。我们知道Paul Wesley在亚特兰大还有一栋房子，而《吸血鬼日记》的拍摄工作大部分时间也都是在亚特兰大。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》Paul Wesley爱巢曝光
